custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM WikiPage WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (nodeId = ?) AND (createDate [$CREATE_DATE_COMPARATOR$] ?) AND (head = ?) AND (status = ?)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT WikiPage.pageId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM WikiPage WHERE WikiPage.groupId = ? AND WikiPage.nodeId = ? AND WikiPage.head = ? AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$STATUS$])
SELECT {WikiPage.*} FROM WikiPage WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (nodeId = ?) AND (createDate [$CREATE_DATE_COMPARATOR$] ?) AND (head = ?) AND (status = ?) ORDER BY createDate DESC
SELECT {WikiPage.*} FROM WikiPage LEFT JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classPK = WikiPage.resourcePrimKey) WHERE (AssetEntry.classPK IS NULL)

SELECT {WikiPage.*} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT WikiPage.pageId FROM WikiPage WHERE WikiPage.groupId = ? AND WikiPage.nodeId = ? AND WikiPage.head = ? AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$STATUS$]) ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN WikiPage ON TEMP_TABLE.pageId = WikiPage.pageId ORDER BY WikiPage.nodeId ASC
